response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value and significance for both of us. This special offer is designed to ensure that you have the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at a highly favorable rate, maximizing your savings while securing its value. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10800}
